attributes.action: Halt the process of introducing body scanners in airports.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
"He who trades liberty for security deserves neither and will lose both." ~Thomas Jefferson

The introduction of such measure only erodes the liberty of the people of this country further.

The 'threat of terror' is no more than it has ever been and such measures are simply scaremongering to control the people of this country in an unnecessary fashion.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
